description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 16, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. This requirement is for PWGSC at the Connaught Range, Shirley Blvd., Ottawa, ON to provide maintenance services on heating, ventilation, air conditioning (HVAC), commercial refrigeration and boiler equipment, including all necessary tools, services, materials, travel and labour on equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work. There are security requirements associated with this requirement. There is a mandatory site visit associated with this requirement. The site visit will begin at 31 Shirley Blvd., Ottawa, ON on April 26th, 2023 at 10:00 AM EDT. The visit will be accompanied by a facility escort. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than April 20, 2023 at 14:00 EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
